attributes.action: Stop the use of road salt on Britain's roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The use of Road Salt on Britain's roads causes unnecessary damage to cars, motorcycles and other vehicles from corrosion during the winter months and untold environmental damage to our eco-systems and waterways as a pollutant.

There are many alternatives used in other European and US states that do not cause this environmental and personal vehicle damage.

It's not just vehicles that are rusting unnecessarily - damage to Vegetation, Mammal, Bird and Aquatic life are all suffering as a result, not to mention the damage to our drinking groundwater supplies.

We ask that you create legislation to stop the use of Road Salt within the next year and find a more suitable alternative.
